response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties. Given its worth to you, we believe it's important to ensure a fair transaction that respects its true market value. Considering its significance and your interest, I propose to offer you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer not only provides you with an excellent deal but also secures your investment in a valuable asset. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions regarding the product or the terms. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
